analysis.description:
WandCrowdsale.batchTransfers (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#385-390) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.batchTransfers(_accounts,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#389)

WandCrowdsale.raiseInitialSupply (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#398-401) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.raiseInitialSupply(_supply) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#400)

WandCrowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#437-448) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(owner,leftoverTokens.div(1000000000000000000)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#446-447)

WandCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#477-495) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,numTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol)

Reentrancy in WandCrowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#437-448):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(owner,leftoverTokens.div(1000000000000000000)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#446-447)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdSaleOn (/unique_chucks/13/0xe5bb2aa9e4d748439a66c0f5350257abbce4d8b6.sol#447)
